lenders.name: JaneandRaphael

lenders.occupational_info: I worked for many years as a potter with my studio at home and sold my wares at markets and through shops.I have retrained and now work in a University Library. Raphael is an artist finishing his studies while working for money part time plus finding time to be in the studio.  I have three grown daughters (my greatest artwork!) and a new grandson so feel very blessed with our life.

lenders.name: Matthias
lenders.occupational_info:
Ich habe verschiedene Internetportale, dabei geht es um ganz verschiedene Dinge, z.b.: 
www.viando.de ist ein experten portal, wo man Experten findet in allen Bereichen der Wirtschaft.
www.finanzxl.de ist ein Finanzportal, hier findet ihr alles was mit Finanzen,Geld, Versicherungen , PKV und Preisvergleichen zu tun hat,
www.verduften.de ist ein Urlaubsportal, hier findet ihr alles was mit Urlaub,verreisen, Hotels, flüge un Preisvergleichen zu tun hat.
www.zaster.de hier findet ihr einfach alles was mit geld und Preisvergleichen zu tun hat.
www.kontaktlinse.at hier findet ihr alles was mit Kontaktlinsen zu tun hat und wie man beim Kauf jedeMenge geld sparen kann.
www.tarifxl.de Hier gibts alles was mit Finanzen zu tun hat, vorallem aber Vergleiche von Versicherungen.
www.finanzierer.de Wenn ihr auf der Suche nach günstigen Krediten seid, seid ihr hier genau richtig!

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy seeing people do something of themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I assist people who have dementia

lenders.name: Carolin

lenders.occupational_info: I am organising events, moves, workflows, offices,... - almost everything which needs an expert in organisation!

lenders.name: Giles
lenders.loan_because:
En 2004 vivia en Sutiava, Leon, Nicaragua, por seis meses. Fui a Nicaragua para aumentar mi espanol y apprender algo del pueblo. Trabaje en el Centro de Salud F.P.P., y el Puesto de Salud de Poneloya.

Tengo memorias sola buenas de mi tiempo en Leon. Me disfruta tanto poder ayudar la gente de Nica que quiere amejorar sus vidas.

Viva Leon Jodido!
lenders.occupational_info: Hago mi entrenamiento como especialista en gastroenterologia en Nottingham, Inglaterra.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: I believe it empowers men and women to be self-supporting. I have been so fortunate to have always had food, shelter, love and security. I hope to be able to help others by enabling them to better their lot in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I own 2 restaurants where we sell coffee, tea, sandwiches, and baked goods. We have many very hard-working men and women who work alongside us serving customers and making product.

One of my favorite words is 'altruism'.

lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Nonprofit Tech
lenders.loan_because: Nonprofit Tech feels it's important to give. We've decided to go beyond our support of organizations, and use Kiva to give directly to people, as well.
lenders.occupational_info: We support nonprofit and public organization by simplifying, improving, and managing their technology needs.

lenders.name: sheila
lenders.loan_because: It's not a charitable donation.  The first time it's a small business loan, but each time it's repaid it becomes a reinvestment of the same dollars, making me a successful financier.  "It's a powerful and sustainable way to empower someone right now to lift themselves out of poverty."

lenders.name: John Hall
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur. I know how hard it is to get started and I want to support the dreams of others that want to make a better life for themselves. I feel extremely blessed in my life and that is why it is my obligation to give to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist and an author.

lenders.name: Chima
lenders.loan_because: I believe financial resource is a backbone to any establishment when funded yields certain results which is favorable on the part of the owner and the society he finds himself.
lenders.occupational_info: As African we have a great and diverse talents we were born with. It is imperative that we use them to achieve the best be it in business endeavors or other areas of life meant to push us through the falling Economy in Africa.

lenders.name: Tara, Drew & Jack
lenders.loan_because: when you give what you have, you create the space for prosperity in your own life and in the lives of others.  Kiva is our way of expressing gratitude for everyone who has shared their prosperity with us.

lenders.name: Pere
lenders.loan_because: I dream

lenders.name: Jon Lindström
lenders.loan_because:
In Sweden everyone is allowed to take good loans from the government so we all can study at a University. I'm thankful that I can, with the help of loans,  full fill my dream to become a Physician. This is the reason I like to help people full fill their dreams and advance their way of life.

I lend money because I think loans stimulate growth and development much better than given money.

I focus my loans on food production and infrastructure. I believe these are the main areas which are most important to improve first in poor countries. 

The interest rate taken by the field partners is rather important for me. I believe it absurd with rates higher than 20% when we take all the risk. It's not the field partners I wish to help, it's the borrower.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I can think of no better way to share God's love than to put my resources to work for the benefit of others.
lenders.occupational_info: Pastor of Blair Lutheran Church in Blair, Wisconsin.

lenders.name: Hjördis
lenders.loan_because: It is important to trust someone and help him

lenders.name: Drew & Sarah
lenders.loan_because: Anyone who has ever succeeded at anything has done so by the help of others.

lenders.name: David and Christina
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we see the great advantage of a company like Kiva that gives people that are willing to work the opportunity to get out of poverty and make a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: We are involved with people from all over the world in their wedding day or the day that they renew their vows.  This is a very enjoyable work that is very rewarding.

lenders.name: Christel
lenders.loan_because: I've received a loan as well from a good friend when no bank was willing to help us. The trust I've got from the good friend, meant a lot to me. I gave me hope and a more peaceful mind. Plus the ability to dream again.

lenders.name: Kelly & Dave
lenders.loan_because:
I believe it is the right thing to do. If I can help someone/some people have a better life/better lives, then that is always a good thing.

I can never loan a lot, but I believe that even the smallest amount makes a big difference.

I like loaning as 100% of the money reaches the people who need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in full time education studying Archaeology and History at Cardiff University. I also work for a large gas and electric company here in the UK to help me stay in education.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I think it's amazing to be fortunate enough to share our wealth to the far corners of the globe and help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise money for libraries, which in the United States provide ALL people with free access to books, computers and knowledge.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to raise their own business to act independent - especially women.
lenders.occupational_info: I´m the manager of a district office for a political party

lenders.name: Brock
lenders.loan_because: it is a brilliant concept: a micro-loan. I have been searching for a better, rational charity to give to for many years. But unlike traditional charity, these contributions give incentive for individuals to work, to innovate, and to spread capitalism all over the world. Capitalism is the only hope for ending worldwide, extreme poverty.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.occupation: Executive Director of a small charity

lenders.name: katie
lenders.loan_because: People of this world work better together and I want apart of it.
lenders.occupational_info: I currently design clean room facilities, (clean room is a place where micro chips are made for example) I mainly do ductwork design.

lenders.name: Jan

lenders.name: Geri

lenders.occupational_info: Making Educational Games for Children

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: It helps people who have the desire and the drive to help themselves and others.
lenders.occupational_info: While my retail job pays the bills, my heart is in my writing.

lenders.name: Nellie and Corné
lenders.loan_because: we can really help/support  people to build up a better live for themselves and their family with lending money. We really like the idea behing KIVA.ORG, and also the possibility to spread the loans over multiple projects across the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Nellie worked as a nurse in our local hospital, Corné  works as a project manager with a bank.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I believe you help those who help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I offer my advice to large companies on how to analyze data.

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: I am an adoptive mother.  Because of the privileges I've had in my life, I am able to be the mom to a beautiful daughter - and her birthmom was not able to raise her because of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home raising my two great children.

lenders.name: Paolo
lenders.loan_because: I think improving emeging business is very important!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a bank.

lenders.name: Allen & Linda
lenders.loan_because: It gives me one way to help other people
lenders.occupational_info: My passion.

lenders.name: Shareen
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Lorraine
lenders.loan_because: Many people working together to make a difference is foundational to a better world.

lenders.name: Peter M.
lenders.loan_because: I feel very privileged to be able to lend other money

lenders.name: Aswar
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is my duty, as a person whom life has given much, to give to those who have little.
lenders.occupational_info: I study at a school that is for students in the classes of 9 through 12. (I am currently in Class 10)

lenders.name: Martha
lenders.loan_because: I hope that this will make it possible for others to get a better living and hopefully also a way to improve their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Process Manager within the telecom area (Ericsson SW Supply).

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: I can.  Anything that I can do to help others be more self sufficient motivates me.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend my work time helping those around me be the best they can be!

lenders.name: Fliss
lenders.loan_because: we received some money at our wedding recently and I wanted to invest it wisely!

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: nice

lenders.name: Britt
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Stefan
lenders.loan_because: I am able to do so.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: My grandfather has instilled in me the need to give back to the world. I am very lucky to have the support to see my dreams realized and I want everyone else to have the same chance and support.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a city in recreation and special events. I get to work with people all day and I love it!

lenders.name: Jay & Amie
lenders.loan_because: we like to help people =)
lenders.occupational_info: Amie is a high school math and English teacher.  Jay is a Web Developer - he makes web sites.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: It makes a difference.

lenders.name: Sid and Joan
lenders.loan_because: we care!

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I want to give others a chance to have a good life, and repay some of the help I had in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help married people to get along better and individuals to be happier in their life.

lenders.name: Blue Topper Folks
lenders.loan_because: It spreads our gratitude.  And it make the world a better place for our son.

lenders.name: Verlin and Elaine
lenders.loan_because: we want to share what we have been given
lenders.occupational_info:
Verlin has a small woodworking shop primarily making wood entry doors
Elaine is a psychiatric nurse manager at a small non profit hospital

lenders.name: Sydney
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their self-sufficiency goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on projects and procedures at an agricultural lender in California.

lenders.name: Mukunda
lenders.occupation: social worker for future generaion to come

lenders.name: Kang
lenders.loan_because: Helping fellow entrepreneurs in third world countries succeed might just prove to be the way for them to break out of the poverty cycle.
lenders.occupational_info: I have several online businesses, and plan to start offline businesses very soon, once I've managed to achieve a sizable passive income online.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone can make a difference.

lenders.name: Pikachu
lenders.occupation: an engineer, a kid, and a musician
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people.
lenders.occupational_info:
Fighting Chaos and Entropy.
Extending our reach.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: if I did not loan this money I would probably just buy something that I "want".  Instead I get to help people who "need" it to live and try to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: We all are one.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to communicate in a way that is easier and faster.

lenders.name: Coach Gia
lenders.loan_because:
I do all this for the sake of the gospel, that I may share in its blessings. ~1 Corinthians 9:23 NIV 
For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life. ~John 3:16 NIV
lenders.occupational_info: Ambassador for Christ!

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I think Kiva is such a fantastic idea, as its not just a handout, it lets people in the developing world take pride in working to make a better life for themselves and their families.  Being able to play a small part in this feels great.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: I have the ability to give.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist people and athletes in achieving their personal health and fitness goals.  If you feel good, you will have the energy, health and vitality to perform well. And if you always strive to do your best - then life will reward you.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: it is unbelievably easy to do

lenders.name: Linda Sharp
lenders.loan_because: It is a small way to make a real difference. I also love reading the profiles of the other lenders I have joined with in each loan. It is neat to think of working on a team with people from all over the globe - people I have never met. I like to think about who they are and send good energy out to them and to the person we are loaning to.

lenders.name: Ethan Mombourquette
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance at doing something great.
lenders.occupational_info: I love my work. There is nothing that brings me more joy than when I can cause a student to become interested in learning (anything). I stand at the front of the class and teach about two lessons each week; the rest of the time is just the students working, either alone or in groups, and asking me questions.

lenders.name: Teal
lenders.loan_because: Its easy to help when so little is asked for.

lenders.name: Stacey and Jordan
lenders.loan_because: It's important to me to try to make the world a better place and empower my fellow humans. I've traveled a bit in central and South America.  I love the cultures, the people and the language (Spanish).
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 7 - 9 year olds to read, write, do math, and art.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: helping people help themselves is good

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people help themselves

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I've been fortunate to live and earn in a way that is comfortable. Not everyone is as fortunate and some are very less so. I saw an episode of Penny Revolution and saw this as a venue I  could use to share and help others, so here I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a telecommunications technician,my main responsibilities are installing and maintaining the copper and  fiber cables that provide  the telephone,data and video network of my  employer

lenders.name: T&E
lenders.loan_because: We rather lend a fishing pole then give a fish./ Parce que je préfère prêter une cane à pêche que de donner un poisson.
lenders.occupational_info: I put together images and text so it can be printed in books./ J'assemble les images et le texte pour que ça puisse être imprimé. Aubergiste va de soit, Hostel keeper seems straight foreward.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: Why wouldn't I? Lending $25 to empower someone in the developing world makes more sense to me than having a few extra dollars of spending money sitting in my wallet.
lenders.occupational_info: When I'm not at home with three children under 5... I write articles and other communications for a respected Canadian company. I'm fortunate to have an energizing job working with truly talented people!

lenders.name: Charlie
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do!

lenders.name: hector
lenders.loan_because: I saw it make a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: Forecasting the weather!

lenders.name: Raj
lenders.loan_because: I want to be part of a mutually beneficial relationship
lenders.occupational_info: I teach graduate-level business students

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: I love being able to help others with the money the Lord has blessed me with.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of sick and premature babies.

lenders.name: The Browne Clan
lenders.loan_because: We have so much, let's give a little, because with a little, we can give so much!

lenders.name: Lucy
lenders.loan_because: we are all one family.

lenders.name: Sita
lenders.loan_because: we are all One
lenders.occupational_info: spiritual seeker

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.occupation: Album Designer; Co-Owner of Photography Business
lenders.loan_because: I like having a direct impact on someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a photography business with my husband. We photograph weddings, special events, families and new moms. I also design albums for our business and have started my own business, www.albumdiva.com, for professional photographers who want to outsource their album designs.

lenders.name: Felicia
lenders.loan_because: Someday I want to have my own clothing business, but until that day, I'd like to help other people make that happen!
lenders.occupational_info: I tutor students in math, but I also like to make clothes!

lenders.name: Tamara
lenders.loan_because: I believe in microfinancing and love being able to participate on a personal level.
lenders.occupational_info: I coordinate environmental projects and partnerships in the former Soviet Union.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I believe all mankind deserves a chance to provide for their families and that those of us who have been honored with wealth should spend a great deal of what we having giving back!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people plan their retirement investments and help them learn to budget so they can provide for themselves and others.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: i admire and respect the entrepreneurial spirit exhibited by these loan applicants.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: Someone loaned to us and the stories are priceless.
lenders.occupational_info: We teach at the university and at home.

lenders.name: NURAIN
lenders.loan_because:
i want to help me friend to have her confidence back and stand up with her legs.
i also want to start a small business.

lenders.name: NJH
lenders.loan_because: I have a conscience and priorities...
lenders.occupational_info: I've mostly worked testing software, but really, I test everything I run into...

lenders.name: Birte
lenders.loan_because: Many small people, who in many small places do many small things, can alter the face of the world. I can't get this quote right, but you know what I mean. :-)

lenders.name: Y. C.
lenders.loan_because: Love to human.

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: It is so cool to help people on the other side of the world. And: why should the bank have my money?
lenders.occupational_info: Making Websites like kiva.org. Programming PHP, MySQL, JavaScript, CakePHP, Zend Framework, HTML, CSS and so on.

lenders.name: Adina Cappell
lenders.loan_because:
"There are eight levels of charity, each greater than the next.

[1] The greatest level, above which there is no greater, is ..... endowing him with a gift or loan, or entering into a partnership with him, or finding employment for him, in order to strengthen his hand until he need no longer be dependent upon others..."

Maimonides, Mishneh Torah, Laws of Charity, 10:7-14

lenders.name: kakito
lenders.loan_because: BECAUSE I'M RUNINING A BUSINESS THAT WHY I NEED LOAN
lenders.occupational_info: YES

lenders.name: Klaus
lenders.loan_because: I want to support entrepreneurs in developing countries.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I can and am able by the Grace of God

lenders.name: Lyndsey
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who are trying to better their lives and maybe need a little financial support. If everyone shared their wealth the world would be a different place!!

lenders.name: Vera
lenders.loan_because:
Microfinance works! 
I've been given a lot of opportunity and feel the need to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: Movie Maker, Educator, Spiritual Advisor

lenders.name: LaNita
lenders.loan_because: I want to support the economy on an international level.  The travel and tourism industry is world wide, we (small entrepreneurs)  can all network and benefit from promoting each other!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with directions and activity choices while they are visiting the resort property I work for. I also, along with other security officers, keep the entire facility safe.

lenders.name: Taylor and Shelby
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: We raise cattle with our parents.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: women and girls are still second-class citizens in most countries.
lenders.occupational_info: Encourage local decision makers to build healthier communities.

lenders.name: Preetha & Srini
lenders.loan_because: We need to eliminate poverty one family at a time. Being parents of two kids, the thought of a child going to bed hungry breaks our hearts.
lenders.occupational_info: We were born and brought up in India. Now we live in the U.S.

lenders.name: Cathlena
lenders.loan_because: that's what is in my heart

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: every one has such amazing ideas and ambitions but not always the footing
lenders.occupational_info: still trying to find the perfect fit.

lenders.name: T. Michael
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to provide for themselves and their loved ones.

lenders.name: Roxanne
lenders.loan_because: I want to help small businesses succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage finances for small companies.

lenders.name: Birgit
lenders.loan_because: As someone else here so beautifully put it: "I believe in sharing". Also: I think that this is a perfect way to redistribute wealth on a small scale - and then again, not so small, if many of us start doing so.

lenders.name: Marci
lenders.loan_because: Many times in my life, I got help when I needed it.   This is my chance to pay it forward.  I am thankful that I am able to help.  It makes me happy.  The Kiva gift certificate was given to me by my sister for my birthday.

lenders.name: Peter and Pam
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people become successful by starting their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: very satisfying

lenders.name: Travis
lenders.loan_because: Its not government controlled.
lenders.occupational_info: I study and prevent workplace incident, accidents and death.

lenders.name: Anila and Thakor
lenders.loan_because: I can & we must share our good fortune with the rest of the world!

lenders.name: Nitsa
lenders.loan_because: I can appreciate the hard work of others in their strivings to better their lives. Nothing is free in this world, so a little help goes a long way.
lenders.occupational_info: Full-time student at the University of South Florida. Also work for the campus as a building manager in the student center, and the advertising director for the activities board.

lenders.name: Jodi
lenders.loan_because: I can, and should!!!!!

lenders.name: Bayan
lenders.occupational_info: I am a screenwriter and eventually hope to see my screenplays made into actual films.

lenders.name: michael
lenders.loan_because: Charity is not the answer
lenders.occupational_info: We provide healthy life style products such as manuka honey and organic products in the middle east, we also ship internationally

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: My family may not be rich by America's standards, but we are by the world's.  We always have food on the table and a roof over our heads.  I give because I am blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: I market music for a Christian Record Label.  It takes an entrepreneurial spirit to do this job in an ever-changing musical climate.  It gives me an appreciation for what these loan recipients are stepping out to do in their own areas of the world.

lenders.name: Katja
lenders.loan_because: it´s a perfect idea: you help, you get back your money and you help again.

lenders.name: Richard & Marina
lenders.loan_because: We want to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: We are just caring people who want to help others.

lenders.name: Cornelia
lenders.loan_because: We are all neighbours on this planet.

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women succeed! I am inspired by women who are motivated to change their lives for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that imports wines from around the world.

lenders.name: Rosemary
lenders.loan_because: I want to offer others the opportunity to fulfill their dreams and live a better life.  We have so much abundance we need to share it with others !
lenders.occupational_info: I manage marketing programs for a high tech computer company.

lenders.name: Muhammad
lenders.occupational_info: My name is Muhammad,I come from a big family of 11 kids.  I was born in Kabul, Afghanistan. We became refugees when Afghanistan's war started.  We have been Pakistan refugees since I was 12 years old.  In the past I have worked as a teacher, cleaner,and taught internet to people in school. In Pakistan it is hard to find good jobs unless one has money, and being a refugee makes it harder yet. I want to start a business so I can help my family be happy and one day go to Canada to marry the woman who as help me get to this site. I will work very hard to get to my dream life.

lenders.name: Tamara
lenders.occupational_info: I am disabled but have a mind and heart for giving. People tend to see my wheelchair first then me. I am real, I am human, I am a loving person, Help me and I'll help you. We need to help others to help ourselves.

lenders.name: Meryl
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently studying biology at Hunter College in New York City

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.occupation: I work as a Police Dispatcher.
lenders.loan_because: I have been to countries where people need the help of others; and it is such a simple thing to do to help someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a police dispatcher, I answer phone calls and radio traffic to get the officers to the locations where they are needed. I also support the officer when they are on scene with information.

lenders.name: Joann
lenders.loan_because: The people profiles take me back to when I traveled the world and realized even a small amount of money could improve a person's life. Because of family obligations, I no longer travel but Kiva allows me to still connect with people in developing nations and impact their lives in a positive way.
lenders.occupational_info: I write travel articles, juvenile biographies, and women's fiction. `

lenders.name: Cissy
lenders.loan_because: I want to give motivated people a chance to improve their quality of life.
